title: Font Identification Help
content:
Hi Guys,

new on here so be nice please! :)

I need help identifying the font on the following album cover please ... [http://f0.bcbits.com/z/10/53/1053254623-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/f0.bcbits.com/z/10/53/1053254623-1.jpg "http://f0.bcbits.com/z/10/53/1053254623-1.jpg")

Any help to point me in the right direction is always welcome!

Thanks,

Karl
author: karlnuttall

comments.content: I think this has been posted here before for an ID, not sure if it was successful then. I presume it is the band name you’re looking to have identified? I strongly suspect that it’s simple customisation, with certain elements added and deleted from the original glyphs.

Yes, sorry. It is the band name font. I think I have found it after numerous hours of looking!

It looks like this font - [http://www.dafont.com/futurist-fixed.font?fpp=50&text=ALVAREZ+KINGS](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/www.dafont.com/futurist-fixed.font?fpp=50&text=ALVAREZ+KINGS "http://www.dafont.com/futurist-fixed.font?fpp=50&text=ALVAREZ+KINGS")

But like you say, with customisation.

Some previous related discussions: [http://typophile.com/node/100787](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/typophile.com/node/100787 "http://typophile.com/node/100787"), [http://typophile.com/node/100237](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/typophile.com/node/100237 "http://typophile.com/node/100237"), [http://typophile.com/node/98172](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/typophile.com/node/98172 "http://typophile.com/node/98172"), [http://typophile.com/node/94940](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/typophile.com/node/94940 "http://typophile.com/node/94940")  
Unfortunately, don't know this one. As usual, looks like it has been started from [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/futura). Some suggestions: [Diamonds](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/diamonds/), [Evolette A](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/26plus-zeichen.de/en/fonts/tj-evolette-a/), [Lightyears](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/lightyears), many ones at [TenDollarFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/www.tendollarfonts.com/) (TWOFACED, Echelon, Rathe, Parqa, Fonecian, Finding 57, Harf 77, Labieno, Positano, Marina, Alumia...)  
More inspiration: [I Am So Tired With Your Experimental Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303020640/http:/experimentalsans.tumblr.com/)
Thanks for the responses guys, much appreciated.

I don’t think that Futurist was the starting point (or Futura, at least directly); other than the obvious difference of the |S| I doubt anyone making these sorts of customisations would modify the |K| in this way.

So do you think Futurist Fixed-Width was designed from scratch?

hhp
